import React from 'react' const Metrics = (props) => { return (

Net Income

{Math.sign(props.netIncome) === -1 ? `-$${props.netIncome}` : `$${props.netIncome}`}

CoC Return

{isFinite(props.values.cashOnCashReturn) ? props.values.cashOnCashReturn : 0}%

Rent Ratio

{isFinite(props.values.rentRatio) ? props.values.rentRatio : 0}%

) } export default Metrics
